tool_description: Ajoutez les données météorologiques d'aujourd'hui à votre application.
name: Qwiper Weather
title: Qwiper Weather

api_list.name: Météo d'aujourd'hui - Niamey, Niger
api_list.description: Obtenez la température, les conditions du ciel, les vents, l'humidité, etc. pour la ville de Niamey.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qwiper-weather.p.rapidapi.com/?json=true"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qwiper-weather.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://qwiper-weather.p.rapidapi.com/?json=true"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qwiper-weather.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
